title: Who Is Ainsley Earhardt’s Ex-Husband? Will Proctor’s Job & Kids
description: Explore details on Ainsley Earhardt's ex-husband, his career, and their family life. Discover more now! The post Who Is Ainsley Earhardt’s Ex-Husband? Will Proctor’s Job & Kids appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Namrata Ghosh
excerpt: Get the scoop on Ainsley Earhardt's ex-husband and their relationship. Discover the details of their marriage, divorce, and more.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Netizens eagerly seek details about Ainsley Earhardt‘s ex-husband and their relationship history. Ainsley Earhardt, a television host and author, co-hosts the popular morning show Fox & Friends alongside esteemed colleagues. Here’s what we know about Ainsley Earhardt’s ex-husband, their relationship, past challenges, and more details. Who was Ainsley Earhardt married to? Ainsley Earhardt was married to her ex-husband, Will Proctor. The couple tied the knot in October 2012, sharing a joyful celebration. However, after nearly seven years of marriage, they decided to part ways and finalized their divorce in 2019. Allegations surfaced claiming Proctor had been unfaithful, but he strongly denied these accusations, maintaining his innocence throughout. What is Will Proctor’s job? Will Proctor is a former starting quarterback. After his football career, Proctor transitioned to corporate work. He currently serves as the Head of Sponsor Coverage and a Managing Director at Neuberger Berman, a New York-based private investment management firm. According to his official bio, he is also a member of the company’s Private Credit investment team. As a football player, Proctor played for the Clemson Tigers at Clemson University in the Atlantic Coast Conference of NCAA Division I-A. He also played for the Calgary Stampeders in the Canadian Football League (CFL). How many kids do Ainsley Earhardt and Will Proctor have? Ainsley Earhardt and Will Proctor share one child. Their daughter, Hayden Dubose Proctor, was born in November 2015. On November 7, Earhardt shared the news in a heartfelt post on X (formerly Twitter): “We are absolutely thrilled to welcome our new baby girl, Hayden, into this world. My husband and I are overjoyed!!” In October 2021, Earhardt candidly discussed experiencing a miscarriage before conceiving Hayden. During an interview with Yahoo! Life and in a personal essay for Women’s Health, she detailed her journey to motherhood and the challenges she faced.
html:
Netizens eagerly seek details about Ainsley Earhardt‘s ex-husband and their relationship history. Ainsley Earhardt, a television host and author, co-hosts the popular morning show Fox & Friends alongside esteemed colleagues.

Here’s what we know about Ainsley Earhardt’s ex-husband, their relationship, past challenges, and more details.

Who was Ainsley Earhardt married to?

Ainsley Earhardt was married to her ex-husband, Will Proctor.

The couple tied the knot in October 2012, sharing a joyful celebration. However, after nearly seven years of marriage, they decided to part ways and finalized their divorce in 2019. Allegations surfaced claiming Proctor had been unfaithful, but he strongly denied these accusations, maintaining his innocence throughout.

What is Will Proctor’s job?

Will Proctor is a former starting quarterback.

After his football career, Proctor transitioned to corporate work. He currently serves as the Head of Sponsor Coverage and a Managing Director at Neuberger Berman, a New York-based private investment management firm. According to his official bio, he is also a member of the company’s Private Credit investment team.

As a football player, Proctor played for the Clemson Tigers at Clemson University in the Atlantic Coast Conference of NCAA Division I-A. He also played for the Calgary Stampeders in the Canadian Football League (CFL).

How many kids do Ainsley Earhardt and Will Proctor have?

Ainsley Earhardt and Will Proctor share one child.

Their daughter, Hayden Dubose Proctor, was born in November 2015. On November 7, Earhardt shared the news in a heartfelt post on X (formerly Twitter):

“We are absolutely thrilled to welcome our new baby girl, Hayden, into this world. My husband and I are overjoyed!!”

In October 2021, Earhardt candidly discussed experiencing a miscarriage before conceiving Hayden. During an interview with Yahoo! Life and in a personal essay for Women’s Health, she detailed her journey to motherhood and the challenges she faced.
